title: Hotblood
description: A kiss to save the world. Dariana Sanders has no soul until she steals one from a mysterious stranger. Now, instead of being doomed to die, she's forced to live the life of a Hotblood, a being created to fight demons and destroy taint. With violent impulses and dangerous addictions, she has to make her own life, her own way. Enter the moody and evocative world of House of Slide where a soulless girl becomes a rampaging Hotblood. Will her new destructive tendencies leave her a burnt out husk if her brother's murderer doesn't get her first?
author: Juliann Whicker
